name: TLD 121 Aircraft Loader
description: A self-propelled, dual-platform elevator designed to transfer containers and pallets.

name: Airport Baggage Truck
description: Ground support vehicle used for the transportation of luggage.

name: Airport Catering Truck
description: Specialized high-lift vehicle used to deliver galley supplies.

name: Ground Power Unit (GPU)
description: Mobile power source providing electrical energy to aircraft.
